archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.4.3e: e) changes should be reviewed to ensure that they do not compromise security controls (e.g. by checking software to ensure it does not contain coding errors or malicious code, such as computer viruses, spyware, ransomware, rootkits, botnet software, keystroke loggers or back doors)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
